author: Giacomo Giannotti
description: Layers of sour citrus, bittersweet vanilla and cleansing Moscato grape spirit. Best enjoyed as an aperitivo.
name: Stonage
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
